body:
Seems legit.

When i spend 100 mana, and accept the next 140 seconds of complete vulnerability, for one spell.  I expect said spell to do its job and put the Yasuo as far away from me as it can.

But no, of course it drops Yasuo right down on my head while I'm trying to re-position behind the wall _(fully expecting the ~~%%%%~~ crit swordsman to be on the other side)_

Azir players will know that this sh*t happens often enough to not be funny.
Vsing Yasuo is already hellish enough, even when your spells DO work.

replies.body: 86 yasuo and make league great again
